name: Pinball BREAKER (itch)
description:
For best preformance, turn on hardware acceleration in your browser's settings.

  Pinball Breaker is a hybrid of the classic genre of "pinball" with the goal-oriented game type of "break the target." Pick from a wide cast in this cross-over of CubePunk's characters from pre-existing and upcoming properties! Featuring full voice acting an entire album's worth of original music.

CONTROLS:
paddles - LEFT and RIGHT arrow
ball reset - ENTER
pause - ESC
